trans-unit.source: when green flag clicked set [index v] to [1] set [multiplier v] to [10] set [first 9 digits v] to [0] set [total v] to [0] set [last digit v] to [0] ask [Enter the first 9 digits of an ISBN-10 number:] and wait set [first 9 digits v] to (answer) repeat (9) change [total v] by ((multiplier) * (letter (index) of (first 9 digits))) change [index v] by (1) change [multiplier v] by (-1) end set [last digit v] to (((0) - (total)) mod (11)) if <(last digit) = [10]> then say [The last digit is: X] else say (join [The last digit is: ] (last digit)) end
